settings.comments:
(This node is ignored by the parser.)
NOTE: DEFAULT SETTINGS FILE Values here will be over-ridden by values in the user settings file, "_user/settings.xml"
- "true" and "false" are translated to booleans - a number written as a percent, e.g. 10%, can be interpreted later, but is read as a string - Numbers are returned as numeric, not string - hAlignment = left, right or center - slideview.autoFadeToolsTime > 0 means slideView is handling navbar + tools, etc., auto fading don't also set navbar.autoFadeTime, but leave it at "0"
- pageMarkNumbering = "chapter" or "book" Date formatting: http://www.lua.org/pil/22.1.html

adjustFontsToBaseline.comment: use fontmetrics.txt to position fonts on baseline, in some places

currentStateFilename.comment: Do not incude the suffix, e.g. .json!

userSettingsFileName.comment: Do not incude the suffix, e.g. .json!

class.msgCannotLoadBook: Something is wrong, I cannot load the book!

currentStateFilename.comment: Do not incude the suffix, e.g. .json!

class.msgInvalidOrientation: Please turn your device to see the book.

layerIndex.value: background, pagebackground, image, shapes, pictures, sprites, plugins, textblock, grids, animation, links, buttons, panoramas, caption, pagenumber, overlay, lockcover, chapterlockcover, frontstage

autoGoNextPageTime.comment: Delay between pages in a slideshow

pageOutsideMargin.comment: Margin around page, shows chapter background color.

class.captionFooterText: ### set, ,,,,,,,25% Camera: {{aperture}} {{shutterSpeed}} at {{isoSpeedRating}}, {{focalLength}} lens on {{cameraModel}} ### set, ,,,,,,,50% ( {{pageNumberInChapter}} of {{pagecountInChapter}} / {{pageNumberInBook}} of {{pagecountInBook}} )

frameImagePadding.note: applies only when using an image

pageReferenceFrameFixedWidth.comment: if set then use as percent of screen width

class.name: {{booktitle}} by {{bookauthor}}
class.subtitle: {{title}}
class.caption: See the app in the iTunes App Store.

class.twitterFailMsg: Tweet failed, but I don't know why!
